Name: Minimum size
Description: Minimum size of events to be detected, in pixels

Name: Avoid image boundary
Description: Remove pixels close to image boundary

Name: Poisson noise model
Description: Use Poisson-Gaussian noise model or not

Name: Frames per segment
Description: Cut video to pieces to avoid global trend

Name: Baseline window
Description: Window size for finding active voxels

Name: Area ratio to find seed curve
Correct baseline trend
Description: The order of the model to correct trend
